price: Diles: "Mi Señor rechaza lo falso con la verdad, Él conoce lo oculto".
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yaqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
